name: Landing Dock
description: You're located in the Landing Dock. To the west you notice an escape dock littered with debris. To the East you find a beat up repair shop, advertising "Their low prices are to die for". South of you, you'll find your ship. There's some smoke coming out of the FTL engine. You curse the stupid space debris for damaging your craft while you search for a repair.

name: Repair Workshop
description: Inside the shop you see repair parts, including a locked toolbox, knocked over on the ground. There's blood smeared behind a counter (someone must have had a bad accident). The only exit is the way you came in, back to the west.

name: Central Hub
description: As soon as you step inside you start to slowly drift upwards. You look around and see floating tables and crates. The generator must be broken so this room isn't getting any gravity. To the east you find a bright flickering neon light that reads "Jill's Cantina". There are also exits to the west and south.

name: Bar
description: There's space music playing on the jukebox. The tables near the western exit are stacked on each other, some broken cleanly in half. Grabbing a drink from the bar doesn't sound like a bad idea.

name: Medical Bay
description: The smell of iron fills the room. The walls are painted red and there's a few bodies lying on the ground. There are medical supply boxes on the ground and some on the shelves, all empty.

name: Escape Shuttle
description: The area is littered with cargo boxes, rats, and wires hanging loosely from the walls. "There is an immobile robot in the corner. It is cold, dark, and holding a long rod. Maybe I can find a battery to turn it back on." The exit to the east is the only way out.

name: Ship
description: The ship's FTL drive is broken and needs to be fixed in order to continue with our mission. If only i have a lever to repair it.
